Package com.jcabi.github

Interface Contents

  • @Immutable
public interface Contents
    Github contents.

    0.8
    Version:
    $Id: a7c0f7abd912950657e20838108bd8eaf1377810 $
    Author:
    Andres Candal (andres.candal@rollasolution.com)
    See Also:
    Contents API
    Suppressed Checkstyle violations:

        throws IOException
